document_data.name: Aerel Hassammar
document_data.refs3e: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|27}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 21: Where Zhents Feel At Home}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''Aerel Hassammar''' was the owner and operator of the [[Swords Meet]] inn and tavern located in [[Voonlar]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].

{{quote|''Yeah? Look around, squire. The place is heaving. Every moment I waste standing around answering your inane questions is one more complaint from a patron. Take it elsewhere1''|Aerel Hassammar}}
document_data.Description: Aerel was a burly man, often described as a "[[wolf]] of a man with an [[eagle]] eye."
document_data.Personality: Aerel was a fair man, but relentlessly drove his staff to be fast, efficient, silent, and unseen. On the other hand, he also encouraged them to be "as friendly as guests want them to be". He did not have much of a sense of humor.
document_data.History: In the winter of the {{YearlinkName|1373}}, Voonlar fell undead a sudden [[fiend]]ish attack by the [[Order of the Crippled Fang]]. As the lower plane denizens started during into the city, Aerel Hassammar barred the doors and windows of his establishment to keep everyone safe. Nevertheless, a [[vrock]] broke through and would've slaughtered everyone inside if it was not for a knight named [[Astar Graysteel]].
